node.detail_zh: 患者有長期病患，居於油塘油美苑潤美閣紀律部隊宿舍，駐守北角警署。 2 月 18 日起發燒和咳嗽，雖然他當日並無上班，但同日晚上時曾到西環明星海鮮燒鵝專門店出席聚會。其妻子及外母均出現病徵。
node.detail_en: The patient, with chronic illnesses, lives in Yun Mei House of Yau Mei Court (Disciplined Services Quarters), Yau Tong and works at North Point Police Station. He developed a fever and coughs on Feb 18 and did not go to work on that day. On Feb 18 night, he attended a gathering at Star Seafood Restaurant in Sai Ying Pun, Western District. His wife and mother-in-law have also shown symptoms.

node.location_en: Yun Mei House, Yau Mei Court
node.remarks_zh: 患者家居接觸者，包括妻子及外母，均出現病徵，將被轉送基督教聯合醫院接受治療。
node.remarks_en: His home contacts, his wife and mother-in-law, both developed symptoms and will be transferred to UCH for treatment.

node.location_zh: 協和街 60 號觀塘社區健康中心
node.location_en: Kwun Tong Community Health Center, 60 Hip Wo Street
node.remarks_zh: 曾於 2 月 19 日上午約 10 時至 10 時 30 分從病人寓所接載病人到觀塘社區健康中心的一名的士司機，請致電衞生防護中心熱線 2125 1122。
node.remarks_en: The taxi driver who drove the patient from his home to Kwun Tong Community Health Centre at around 10am to 10.30am on Feb 19 is urged to call the CHP hotline 2125 1122.

node.location_zh: 德輔道西 271-285 號西環明星海鮮燒鵝專門店
node.location_en: Star Seafood and Roasted Goose Restaurant on 271-285 Des Voeux Road West
node.remarks_zh: 2 月 18 日下午 5 時 30 分至 10 時與另外 59 名警務人員聚餐。衞生署界定該 59 名人士被為密切接觸者，當中有 36 人於 20 日在香港仔分區執勤。另外 23 人分別駐守港島總區不同警區及商業罪案調查科。警方已經聯絡所有人士，避免與公眾接觸，回家等候檢疫安排。警方和衞生署正積極瞭解所有密切接觸者過去的警務工作，包括是否曾與公眾接觸。
node.remarks_en: Patient attended a gathering with other 59 Police officers in Sai Ying Pun around 5.30pm to 10pm on Feb 18. 36 of them worked in Aberdeen District on Feb 20 and the other 23 were working in other Eastern Districts as well as in Commercial Crime Bureau. The 59 officers have been suspended from duty and stay home waiting for quarantine arrangement.

node.location_zh: 正街 18 號啟正中心「赤古門」中醫診所
node.remarks_zh: 患者往診所配藥，逗留少於 10 分鐘，當時有配戴口罩。
node.remarks_en: The patient visited the clinic for Chinese medicine dispensing service. He stayed less than 10 minutes while wearing a mask.

node.remarks_zh: 於 2 月17、18 日休假，19、20 日請了病假；在 2 月 4 至 16 日期間，主要在柴灣、北角及香港仔執行警務工作
node.remarks_en: On leave on Feb 17-18; on sick leave on Feb 19-20; mainly carried out his duties in Chai Wan, North Point and Aberdeen between Feb 4 and Feb 16

node.remarks_zh: 患者深喉唾液樣本證實對新型肺炎病毒呈陽性反應，2 月 20 日 被安排入院接受隔離治療。病人現時情況穩定。
node.remarks_en: His respiratory sample was tested positive for novel coronavirus and he is now in a stable condition.
